response.overview: Sexy, striking, scary  Arriana Hayes is an industrious young lady in Jackson, Mississippi who wants nothing more than for her grandfather to get off her case about not settling down and finding a man. At a party she meets Rockefeller Monroe a hustler in crypto currency who's got a crazy amount of money and an even crazier ex, and possibly even crazier secrets.  can love bloom on the battlefield or is this game of love doomed to end in checkmate?
response.tagline: good girls always love bad guys
response.title: Mesmerized by a Hood Millionaire
